QuestData.Title: The Darkness Within
QuestData.Description: You didn't see Captain Doren while you were out there, did you?$b$bThat sniveling Alliance leader must be in hiding somewhere. If he wasn't in that airbase, he can't be far. Search the perimeter - try searching the cave southwest of the main airfield. I want the Alliance gone from here!
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: The entirety of Strongarm Airstrip reports to Doren. Take him down!
